response.overview: One-Click⇢Support How to reverse a Coinbase transaction”, here’s the clear and realistic answer: 1(₮)888(₮)634(₮)2381 A confirmed crypto transaction on Coinbase cannot be reversed. Once a transfer is broadcast to the blockchain and receives network confirmations, it becomes permanent. 1(₮)888(₮)634(₮)2381 Coinbase does not have the authority to cancel or retrieve funds after confirmation because blockchain systems are decentralized and immutable.
